Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDF WHERE IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY CCGDFCODI DESC

INSERT INTO CAM_CCGDF ( CCGDFCODI, PROYCODI, TIPO, DATACATCODI, ANIO, TRIMESTRE, VALOR, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :CCGDFCODI, :PROYCODI, :TIPO, :DATACATCODI, :ANIO, :TRIMESTRE, :VALOR, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_CCGDF SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, TIPO = :TIPO, DATACATCODI = :DATACATCODI, ANIO = :ANIO, TRIMESTRE = :TRIMESTRE, VALOR = :VALOR, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE CCGDFCODI = :CCGDFCODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDF ORDER BY CCGDFCODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_CCGDF SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = 0
SELECT * FROM CAM_CCGDF WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY CCGDFCODI ASC
